channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: A European spacecraft launches to perform a crash scene investigation on an asteroid
item.description: A NASA spacecraft knocked into an asteroid two years ago to test planetary defense. Now, a new mission will inspect the damage, with the goal of helping future asteroid deflection.
item.content:encoded:
A NASA spacecraft knocked into an asteroid two years ago to test planetary defense. Now, a new mission will inspect the damage, with the goal of helping future asteroid deflection.

(Image credit: SpaceX)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Harris and Trump marked 1 year since the Oct. 7 attacks with tributes to the victims
item.description: Vice President Harris remembered the victims of the attack by planting a memorial tree at her residence at the Naval Observatory in Washington, D.C., while former President Trump visited a sacred site for Hasidic Jews in Queens, N.Y.
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Harris remembered the victims of the attack by planting a memorial tree at her residence at the Naval Observatory in Washington, D.C., while former President Trump visited a sacred site for Hasidic Jews in Queens, N.Y.

(Image credit: Kent Nishimura/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Sarah McCammon

item.title: 'All this blood, all this death': Palestinians protest Israel war with no end in sight
item.description: For Palestinian civilians caught in the middle of the ongoing conflict between Israeli forces and the Hamas militant group, the consequences have been unremittingly difficult, and deadly.
item.content:encoded:
For Palestinian civilians caught in the middle of the ongoing conflict between Israeli forces and the Hamas militant group, the consequences have been unremittingly difficult, and deadly.

(Image credit: Zain Jaafar)
item.dc:creator: Anas Baba

item.title: Gospel great Cissy Houston has died at the age of 91
item.description: Renowned soul and gospel singer Cissy Houston has died. She was part of a extraordinary musical family that included Dionne Warwick and her superstar daughter, Whitney Houston.
item.content:encoded:
Renowned soul and gospel singer Cissy Houston has died. She was part of a extraordinary musical family that included Dionne Warwick and her superstar daughter, Whitney Houston.

(Image credit: Michael Buckner)
item.dc:creator: Brandon Gates

item.title: Photos: A look back at the year since Oct. 7
item.description: A year has passed since the Oct. 7 attack on Israel and the start of its war in Gaza. Here's a look at some key moments from photojournalists on the ground.
item.content:encoded:
A year has passed since the Oct. 7 attack on Israel and the start of its war in Gaza. Here's a look at some key moments from photojournalists on the ground.

(Image credit: AFP)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Fact checking falsehoods about FEMA funding and Hurricane Helene
item.description: Rumors, misinformation and lies about the federal government’s response to Hurricane Helene have run rampant since the storm made landfall, especially around FEMA funding.
item.content:encoded:
Rumors, misinformation and lies about the federal government’s response to Hurricane Helene have run rampant since the storm made landfall, especially around FEMA funding.

(Image credit: Mike Stewart)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Supreme Court ducks cases involving everything from abortion to Elon Musk
item.description: The justices also left in place a Michigan state constitutional amendment that barred the use of public funds for private schools.
item.content:encoded:
The  justices also left in place a Michigan state constitutional amendment that barred the use of public funds for private schools.

(Image credit: Kent Nishimura)
item.dc:creator: Nina Totenberg

item.title: Despite mixed reviews, 'Joker 2' is on track to be one of the biggest comic-book-film flops
item.description: Many film critics and comic book fans say they felt the sequel felt short of their expectations. Others argue that was the whole point all along.
item.content:encoded:
Many film critics and comic book fans say they felt the sequel felt short of their expectations. Others argue that was the whole point all along.

(Image credit: Alon Amir)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: 1 year after Hamas attacked Israel, the conflict grows more dangerous than ever
item.description: The Hamas-led assault that killed 1,200 people triggered a devastating Israeli military response in Gaza. Now the war has engulfed Lebanon and threatens to bring Israel and Iran into direct conflict.
item.content:encoded:
The Hamas-led assault that killed 1,200 people triggered a devastating Israeli military response in Gaza. Now the war has engulfed Lebanon and threatens to bring Israel and Iran into direct conflict.

(Image credit: Bashar Taleb)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: NPR wants to know: What are some of your Halloween traditions?
item.description: As Halloween approaches, it's time to start thinking about costumes for the upcoming festivities. But first, NPR wants to hear about your favorite unique holiday traditions.
item.content:encoded:
As Halloween approaches, it's time to start thinking about costumes for the upcoming festivities. But first, NPR wants to hear about your favorite unique holiday traditions.

(Image credit: Rob Stothard)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton
